summary: Visited Aman in Noida — felt genuinely good reconnecting after a long gap. Emotional tone steady. SpendMirror running smoothly; Tutor app still in planning phase. Relationship with Tanvi stabilized after recent conflict. Life rhythm feels positive. One part of mind remains cautious — monitoring for mood escalation, but no signs yet. Meds seem to be holding balance.

wins: Mood and sleep holding steady under new med regimen
ideas: Add light structure to Tutor app planning phase
Continue daily self-checks for mood drift

goals: Maintain social rhythm with low intensity
Keep project execution slow and grounded
